channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Builders rubble, 6th September
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish on Stamford grove west and old hill street, 6th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Plenty of rubbish, 6th September
item.description:
There is a significant amount of litter scattered all along the A206 road from the roundabout near Bexley Recycling Centre towards Dartford Crossing. In addition, in one location a large number of black bags have been dumped together.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 plastic bottles in the kerb that may contain urine, going by the colour, 6th September
item.description:
